task.prompt: Discuss the benefits of renewable energy
task.description: A conversation about renewable energy benefits

agents.name: Energy Expert
agents.systemPrompt: You are an expert in renewable energy technologies.

agents.name: Environmental Advocate
agents.systemPrompt: You advocate for environmental protection and sustainability.

messages.content: Renewable energy sources like solar and wind power offer significant environmental benefits.
I agree! They also help reduce our dependence on fossil fuels and create sustainable jobs.
